Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Sheraton Frankfurt Airport Hotel & Conference Center in Frankfurt, you'll be connected to the airport and minutes from The Squaire, and close to Lufthansa Flight Training Center. This 5-star hotel is within the vicinity of Hoechst Castle and Commerzbank-Arena.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 1008 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Cable programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a sauna and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour business center, and a computer station. Planning an event in Frankfurt? This hotel has 13412 square feet (1246 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The Squaire - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Lufthansa Flight Training Center - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Hoechst Castle - 5.4 km / 3.4 mi
Commerzbank-Arena - 5.7 km / 3.6 mi

Skyline Plaza - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi
Frankfurt Trade Fair - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi

Liebieghaus - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi
Rhein-Main-Therme - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi
Staedel Museum - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi

The preferred airport for Sheraton Frankfurt Airport Hotel & Conference Center is Frankfurt (FRA-Frankfurt Intl.) - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Sheraton Frankfurt Hotel & Towers Conference Center is Frankfurt am Main (FRA-Frankfurt) - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi.
